resources.string: This is a roguelike turn-based game where players control a hero trapped inside an ancient Egyptian tomb filled with treasures and lurking mummies. The goal on each level is to collect the treasure and reach the exit to proceed to the next stage. If the player loses, they must start over from the beginning.

Gameplay takes place on an 8x8 grid. Each turn, the player can perform one of the following actions:
 - Move: The hero can move to an adjacent unoccupied tile (up, down, left, or right). If the tile contains an item (a potion or treasure), it is automatically collected.
 - Attack: If a mummy is on an adjacent tile, the player can attack it. Mummies will also attack the player if they are within range.
 - Drink Potion: The player can drink a potion to restore a portion of their health.
Players can unlock various achievements based on their progress and actions in the game.
